ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Laurentian Pilotage Authority Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the LAURENTIAN PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS in order to broaden the pool of candidates who qualify for an apprentice pilot licence, without compromising their ability of becoming marine pilots.
